org.grouplens.lenskit.mf.funksvd

Class FunkSVDItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemScorer
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.mf.funksvd.FunkSVDItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemScorer

    public class FunkSVDItemScorer
extends AbstractItemScorer
    Do recommendations and predictions based on SVD matrix factorization. Recommendation is done based on folding-in. The strategy is do a fold-in operation as described in Sarwar et al., 2002 with the user's ratings.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FunkSVDItemScorer

        @Inject
public FunkSVDItemScorer(UserEventDAO dao,
                        FunkSVDModel model,
                        @BaselineScorer
                        ItemScorer baseline,
                        @Nullable
                        PreferenceDomain dom,
                        @Nullable@RuntimeUpdate
                        FunkSVDUpdateRule rule)
        Construct the item scorer.
        Parameters:
        dao - The DAO.
        model - The model.
        baseline - The baseline scorer. Be very careful when configuring a different baseline at runtime than at model-build time; such a configuration is unlikely to perform well.
        rule - The update rule, or null (the default) to only use the user features from the model. If provided, this update rule is used to update a user's feature values based on their profile when scores are requested.

    • Method Detail

      • getUpdateRule

        @Nullable
public FunkSVDUpdateRule getUpdateRule()

      • score

        public void score(long user,
         @Nonnull
         MutableSparseVector scores)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScorer
        Score items in a vector. The key domain of the provided vector is the items to score, and the score method sets the values for each item to its score (or unsets it, if no score can be provided). The previous values are discarded.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        scores - The score vector.
